item.title: Optimal asset allocation
item.description: In his book A Random Walk Down Wall Street, Burton G. Malkiel advise readers of an optimal asset allocation depending on age. As an amateur investor, I thought it would be useful to develop a Shiny app which depicts his advices for other interested investors. Here is the app: Optimal asset allocation How to use this app?
